subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Expectations changed dramatically for American riders after a doping scandal led to the withdrawal of four riders who finished second through fifth behind Lance Armstrong last year and left three leading teams with less than a full roster of nine riders.
